interviews.title: interview 1
interviews.blurb: I thought they were my friends...but when I joined the conversation, they stunned me into silence with their outrageous and hurtful statements.

interviews.title: interview 2
interviews.blurb: I was coaching my girls’ basketball team when two young men in suits busted into the gym, grabbed the ball from one of the girl’s hands and took over the court.  I had to act quickly, effectively, and responsibly, but when they referred to me as a “N….,” I nearly lost my cool.
